modal.pull_model_desc: Install a model from the Ollama registry

init_third_party_modal.title: Run via Third-Party Services
init_third_party_modal.description: Are you sure you want to run via third-parties? Your personal data will be shared with third-party services like OpenAI.

notice.still_running: Smart Second Brain is still running. Pelase wait.
notice.still_indexing: Smart Second Brain is still indexing. Please wait.
notice.ollama_not_running: Please make sure Ollama is running before initializing Smart Second Brain.
notice.ollama_gen_model: Ollama model not installed. Please install the model before initializing Smart Second Brain.
notice.ollama_embed_model: Ollama model not installed. Please install the model before initializing Smart Second Brain.
notice.openai_key: Please make sure your OpenAI API Key is valid before initializing Smart Second Brain.
notice.failed: Failed to initialize Smart Second Brain (Error: {error}). Please retry.
notice.failed_indexing: Failed to index notes into your smart second brain. Please retry.
notice.error: An error occured. Please wait for the error to resolve.
notice.not_initialized: Smart Second Brain not initialized. Please initialize first.
notice.error_pulling_model: Failed to pull model from Ollama (Error: {error}). Please retry.
notice.no_notes_retrieved: No notes retrieved. Maybe lower the similarity threshold.
notice.run_failed: Failed to run Smart Second Brain (Error: {error}). Please retry.

chat.regenerate: Deletes all following Messages and regenerates the answer to the current query
chat.save: Save the Chat to a Note
chat.input_placeholder: Chat with your Smart Second Brain...

onboarding.welcome_msg: Welcome to your Smart Second Brain! Your personal AI assistant that helps you to find information in your notes.
onboarding.privacy_mode_note: Your assistant is running in privacy mode. That means it is not connected to the internet and is running fully locally by leveraging Ollama.
onboarding.openai_mode_note: Your assistant is using third party services to run. That means you will have to share all your personal information with these services and your Smart Second Brain needs to be connected to the internet to leverage OpenAIs large language models like ChatGPT.

app.set_origins: Set Ollama origins to enable streaming responses
app.restart_label: Click menu bar icon and then quit
app.quit_label: Click menu bar icon and then quit
app.start_origins: Start the Ollama service with origins

ollama.test_origins: Test if the origins are set correctly

openai.api_key_warning:
> [!Warning] Activate API-Key 
> For the API-Key to work you might have to upgrade to an OpenAI paid account. This means depositing at least $5 onto your OpenAI account. This might change in the future.

settings.excludeff_desc: These files and folders won't be embedded and not be used for generating answers.
settings.clear_desc: This will delete all plugin data and the vector store data. All chat files inside your vault will not be affected.

clear_modal.title: Clear Plugin Data
clear_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the plugin data? Note that only the plugin data and the vector store data will be removed. All chat files inside your vault will not be affected.

settings.autostart_desc: Automatically start the Smart Second Brain when Obsidian starts.
settings.num_docs_retrieve_desc: The maximum amount of documents to retrieve from your vault. Note that documents are not equivalent to notes.
settings.langsmith_key_desc: Provide a Langsmith API Key if you want to trace and evaluate the internals of your Smart Second Brain.
settings.verbose_desc: Enable verbose logging in the Developer Console.

openai.api_key_desc: Provide your OpenAI API Key to use OpenAI's large language models.

model_descriptions.gpt-3.5-turbo: Latest GPT-3.5 Turbo model (16385 Token context window)
model_descriptions.gpt-4: Latest GPT-4 model (8192 Token context window)
model_descriptions.gpt-4-turbo-preview: Latest GPT-4 Turbo model (128000 Token context window)
model_descriptions.text-embedding-3-large: Latest, most capable embedding model for both english and non-english tasks
model_descriptions.text-embedding-3-small: Increased performance over 2nd generation ada embedding model

ollama.base_url_desc: Set the URL of your Ollama instance.

model_descriptions.llama2: Llama 2 is a collection of foundation language models ranging from 7B to 70B parameters.
model_descriptions.llama2-uncensored: Uncensored Llama 2 model by George Sung and Jarrad Hope.
model_descriptions.mistral: The 7B model released by Mistral AI, updated to version 0.2.
model_descriptions.mistral-openorca: Mistral OpenOrca is a 7 billion parameter model, fine-tuned on top of the Mistral 7B model using the OpenOrca dataset.
model_descriptions.gemma: Gemma is a family of lightweight, state-of-the-art open models built by Google DeepMind.
model_descriptions.mixtral: A high-quality Mixture of Experts (MoE) model with open weights by Mistral AI.
model_descriptions.phi: Phi-2: a 2.7B language model by Microsoft Research that demonstrates outstanding reasoning and language understanding capabilities.
model_descriptions.nomic-embed-text: A high-performing open embedding model with a large token context window.

quick_settings.settings_changed:
Settings changed.
Reinitialize Smart Second Brain.

error.other:
An error occured.
Please retry initialization...

tooltip.creativity: Adjusts the level of originality in the model's outputs to suit your preference.
tooltip.similarity: How similar the retrieved documents should be to the user query.
